019
020import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
021import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseRule;
023
024import java.math.BigDecimal;
025import java.util.Random;
026import java.util.regex.Matcher;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028
029/**
030 * RandomParseRule
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 0.1.4.0
034 */
035public class RandomParseRule implements ParseRule {
036
037  private static final Pattern RANDOM_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("random\\((\\d+)-(\\d+)\\)");
038
039  /**
040   * Retrieves an identifier.
041   *
042   * @return The identifier as a String.
043   */
044  @Override
045  public String identifier() {
046
047    return "random";
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Applies the given parse money object to the input string according to the specified rules.
052   *
053   * @param parseMoney the ParseMoney object to apply the rules to
054   * @param input      the input string to apply the rules on
055   */
056  @Override
057  public String apply(final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String input) {
058
059    final Random RANDOM = new Random();
060    final Matcher matcher = RANDOM_PATTERN.matcher(input);
061    if(matcher.find()) {
062
063      final int min = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(1));
064      final int max = Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(2));
065
066      if(min > max) {
067
068        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid random range: " + input);
069      }
070
071      final BigDecimal value = BigDecimal.valueOf(RANDOM.nextInt(min, max + 1));
072      parseMoney.amount(value);
073      return input.replace(matcher.group(), value.toPlainString()).trim();
074    }
075    return input;
076  }
077}
